configurations.description: The configuration of the Connect peer.

connectAttachmentId.description: The ID of the connection attachment.

coreNetworkAddress.description: A Connect peer core network address.

coreNetworkId.description: The ID of a core network.

edgeLocation.description: The Region where the peer is located.

insideCidrBlocks.description: The inside IP addresses used for BGP peering. Required when the Connect attachment protocol is `GRE`. See `aws.networkmanager.ConnectAttachment` for details.

peerAddress.description:
The Connect peer address.

The following arguments are optional:

state.description: The state of the Connect peer.

subnetArn.description: The subnet ARN for the Connect peer. Required when the Connect attachment protocol is `NO_ENCAP`. See `aws.networkmanager.ConnectAttachment` for details.

tags.description: Key-value tags for the attachment. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
